November 21, 1950
Ur, Burton Paulu
Radio Station KUOM
University of•Minnesota
Minneapolis, Minnesota '
Dear Burton:
My apologies lor the delay in answering your request
for the opening session of the Kentucky convention#
Inasmuch as 1 took ho notes, I'm afri&d I can’t give
you much help. At the tine of the afternoon session, I
was concerned with a number of other details and didn't
concentrate much on what was going on but rather what
was Corning up# I am sure your notes and recollections
on the session are as good or better than mine. I
certainly hope you will forgive rae.
Sincerely yours.
Graydon Ausmus, Director
Radio Broadcasting Services
Manager, WOA(Ftf)
